page.title: 13BAGWORTH PIT
page.content: The mine has a very high productivity and produces around 850,000 tonnes although in one year, it did produce over 1 million tonnes.Coalface 21 is one of the most productive faces in Europe.Coal transportation is 100% by conveyer.Output is conveyed by underground roads and surface drift to Nailstone Preparation plant.The mine has a very good safety record.Bagworth has won both the N.C.B. National Safety Awards for the lowest accident rate and the best improvement in accident rate.The mine is monitored by computers.Subsidence is not controlled by the N.C.B. and the exhausted seams are allowed to collapse.The mine has between 7 and 10 years of production left after which the miners will be given the opportunity to transfer to Asfordby Mine in the Vale of Belvior.
